page.title: 13A Parish Priest in Farington
page.content: Father Kellyy is the priest in charge ofSt Catherine's Roman Catholic Church in Farington. He is the fourth priest as the original parish was part of St Main Worden, Leyland. The first church Farington was in the garage of the house of the local Mill owner. The house was bought by the church, demolished and a new bungelow built on site. The garage was extended to make room for more people. Sunday Services are at 8.30, 10.00,3.00and 6.00. A typical day starts with the first service, then correspondence, visits to the sick, elderly and bereaved. After lunch more visits or reading and in the evening often interviews with people getting married or christening. There is a branch of the Vincent de Paul society at the church.
